name: Human
description: A human entity with basic demographic and psychological traits

dimensions.name: age
dimensions.description: The age of the human in years

dimensions.name: gender
dimensions.description: The gender identity of the human

dimensions.name: occupation
dimensions.description: The primary occupation or profession of the human

dimensions.name: extroversion
dimensions.description: How extroverted or introverted the person is

dimensions.name: openness
dimensions.description: How open to new experiences the person is

dimensions.name: conscientiousness
dimensions.description: How conscientious and organized the person is

dimensions.name: education_level
dimensions.description: The highest level of education completed

dimensions.name: is_married
dimensions.description: Whether the person is currently married

name: Fantasy Character
description: A character from a fantasy world with magical abilities and backstory

dimensions.name: race
dimensions.description: The fantasy race of the character

dimensions.name: class
dimensions.description: The character's role or profession in the fantasy world

dimensions.name: age
dimensions.description: The age of the character in years

dimensions.name: magical_ability
dimensions.description: How powerful the character's magical abilities are

dimensions.name: background
dimensions.description: The character's backstory and origin

dimensions.name: alignment
dimensions.description: The character's moral and ethical alignment

dimensions.name: has_magical_item
dimensions.description: Whether the character possesses a significant magical item

name: Organization
description: An organization or institution with defined characteristics

dimensions.name: type
dimensions.description: The type of organization

dimensions.name: size
dimensions.description: The approximate number of people in the organization

dimensions.name: age
dimensions.description: How long the organization has existed in years

dimensions.name: mission
dimensions.description: The primary mission or purpose of the organization

dimensions.name: hierarchy
dimensions.description: How hierarchical the organization's structure is

dimensions.name: public_facing
dimensions.description: Whether the organization is public-facing or secretive

dimensions.name: geographic_reach
dimensions.description: The geographic scope of the organization
